oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Maqāmāt : manuscript, undated
Séances de Ḥarīrī
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ḥarīrī , 1054-1122
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Widener Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Widener Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Widener Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم اللهم انا نحمدك على ما علمت في البيان والهمت في البيان كما نحمدك على ما مبعت في الغطا... :Incipit
Light cream laid paper. 20.8 x 13.4 cm. (17.2 x 8 cm.).

Written in one column with short paragraphs in two columns, 25 lines per pages, in black and red. First two pages framed within double black and golden lines. With comments and additions in the margins.
Ownership statements signed Leblanc and Reinaud (fly leaves 2 and 3) and Seal of Bookshop Maisonneuve and Cie, 15 Quai Voltaire, Paris (inside front cover).
Silk and leather binding with flap.
MS Arab SM275. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Arabic prose literature
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: مقامات : مخطوطة، undated
